iree_add_all_subdirs()

file(GLOB _GLOB_SUPPORT/X_C LIST_DIRECTORIES false RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CONFIGURE_DEPENDS support/*.c)
file(GLOB _GLOB_X_H LIST_DIRECTORIES false RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.h)
file(GLOB _GLOB_SUPPORT/X_H LIST_DIRECTORIES false RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CONFIGURE_DEPENDS support/*.h)
